snippet: JPMorgan Chase's chief executive, Jamie Dimon, retaped an interview on NBC's "Meet the Press" after revealing that his bank had suffered a $2 billion trading loss.
abstract: JPMorgan Chase's chief executive, Jamie Dimon, retaped an interview on NBC's "Meet the Press" after revealing that his bank had suffered a $2 billion trading loss.

byline.original: By KEVIN ROOSE and BRIAN STELTER

headline.main: Dimon's 'Meet the Press' Appearance Mired in Controversy
